DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase II study for recurrent ovarian carcinoma platinum-sensitive and resistant tumors Folfox regimen.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of Oxaliplatin With 5-Fluorouracil in Patients With Recurrent Ovarian Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation of the safety and the efficacy of a combination of oxaliplatin and 5FU (Folfox) in patients with ovarian carcinoma relapsing either after platinum-combined regimen. The Folfox regimen is administered every 14 days. Evaluation of the toxicity is performed at each cycle and evaluation of the efficacy every 4 cycles of chemotherapy.
DOC.criteria: ovarian carcinoma relapse neurotoxicity grade III renal clearance < 60 ml/min
